Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored his second successive half-century of the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 at a strike rate of almost 190.
Hardik Pandya scored 32 from 24 balls, helping to rebuild the innings.
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 7 runs, stunting Afghanistan's chase.
Rashid Khan took 3 wickets for 26 runs, removing key Indian batsmen Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant, and Shivam Dube.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav expressed enjoyment in batting between overs seven to 15, a phase where teams try to control the game.
